mapper.insert: insert into t_employeeinfo (employee_ID, user_Id, employee_Name, employee_Sex, birth_Date, ID_Card, tel, fixed_Phone, degree, description, address, department_Id, salary, employee_Date, fire_Date, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy ) values (#{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{employeeSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{employeeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{fireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update t_employeeinfo set user_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, employee_Name = #{employeeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, employee_Sex = #{employeeSex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, birth_Date = #{birthDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ID_Card = #{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fixed_Phone = #{fixedPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, degree = #{degree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_Id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, salary = #{salary,jdbcType=INTEGER}, employee_Date = #{employeeDate,jdbcType=DATE}, fire_Date = #{fireDate,jdbcType=DATE}, del_Flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_SubTime = #{lastSubtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, subBy = #{subby,jdbcType=INTEGER} where employee_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select employee_ID, user_Id, employee_Name, employee_Sex, birth_Date, ID_Card, tel, fixed_Phone, degree, description, address, department_Id, salary, employee_Date, fire_Date, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_employeeinfo where employee_ID = #{employeeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select employee_ID, user_Id, employee_Name, employee_Sex, birth_Date, ID_Card, tel, fixed_Phone, degree, description, address, department_Id, salary, employee_Date, fire_Date, del_Flag, last_SubTime, subBy from t_employeeinfo
